Pre-Shave Oil

Vitamin E, emu oil, and almond oil.Cedarwood, lavender, tea tree, and ylang ylang essential oils.

Why Exfoliate?
As we grow older our bodies cell turnover slows down, taking longer to shed old skin cells and generate new ones. Exfoliation helps this process by sloughing away, dirt, make-up, dead skin cells, and clogged pores eliminating dull dry skin and leaving behind oh so addicting soft succulent skin.

'Coffee Please'

Coffee grounds, coconut sugar, cane sugar, vitamin E, coconut oil, vanilla extract, and cinnamomum & Frankincense essential oils. - Soap Bar - Coffee grounds, vanilla extract, and shea butter soap base.

'Black Tea & Rose'

Black tea herbs, rose petals, rose essential oil, vitamin E, coconut oil, and rose soap scent. - Soap Bar - Glycerin based soap, black tea herbs, rose soap scent, and red colorant.

'Sweet Oats'

Lavender essential oil, saturated almond oil oats, lavender colorant, cane sugar, lavender petals. - Soap Bar - Lavender essential oil, honey, oats, shea base soap, lavender petals.

'Warm Bowl of Oats'

Breathe, cinnamomum, palmarosa, and mind ease essential oils. Vitamin E saturated oats, vanilla extract, coconut oil, emu oil, coconut sugar, and cane sugar. - Soap Bar - Glycerin based soap, oat, vanilla extract, cinnamon sticks, and oat soap scent.

'Coo Coo for Cocoa'

Coconut sugar, cocoa powder, emu oil, coconut oil, cinnamomum & bergamot essential oils, vanilla extract. - Soap Bar - Honey almond soap scent, cocoa powder, cinnamomum & bergamot essential oils, goats milk soap base, and vanilla extract.

Body Addictions by Ash contains a variety of hand crafted bath essentials. Made locally in Phoenix Arizona, these products will help to melt away tension and soothe everyday troubles. I aim to do so using a variety of therapeutic essential blends. Curious about what product will work best for you? Take some time to treat yourself and contact me here!
